DOC.brief_summary: This trial studies the effect of pregnancies of multiple gestations (i.e. twins, triplets etc.) on the female pelvic floor with regards to the pregnancy itself and labor and delivery mode, by using transperineal ultrasound. This will be compared with pregnancies with single fetuses.
DOC.brief_title: Transperineal Ultrasound for the Female Pelvic Floor in Women With Multiple Gestation
DOC.criteria: Women with multiple gestations Women with singleton gestation Able to understand the consent form None specified
